News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 19th March
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 19th March
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 19th March
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with two Premier League games being shown live on Sky Sports. At 14:15pm Tottenham Hotspur host Southampton at White Hart Lane with Spurs looking to get their fourth win on the bounce. While at 16:30pm Liverpool travel to the Etihad Stadium to play Manchester City with both clubs fighting for a Champions League spot.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
